Name: Insecure Automated Optimizations
Description: The product uses a mechanism that automatically optimizes code, e.g. to improve a characteristic such as performance, but the optimizations can have an unintended side effect that might violate an intended security assumption.

WeaknessOrdinalities.Description: This weakness does not depend on other weaknesses and is the result of choices made during optimization.

ModesOfIntroduction.Note: Optimizations built into the design of a product can have unintended consequences during execution.

CommonConsequences.Note: The optimizations alter the order of execution resulting in side effects that were not intended by the original developer.
